presentation.name: Axel Montiel
presentation.info: Enthusiast of tech and creating applications, now a computer engineering student at UNAM.

about.intro: Hi, thanks for visiting my portfolio. A little about me.
about.bio: I studied in a technical high school where I studied: 'Programming Technician'. During the preparation I learned to program from flowcharts with DFD, web pages, to creating mobile applications with Java. At the end of my studies in the preparation I decided to expand my knowledge and I studied web development with internet courses, with a good programming base, it was easy for me to adapt. Now I am studying engineering where I take programming subjects such as data structures, algorithms and others.

skills.subtitle: Here are some techs with whom I worked.
